Meet the Mayor
==============





Mayor Martin Mudd
-----------------

Martin Mudd was elected Mayor on May 6, 2023.

![Mudd](https://www.cityofdaytontx.com/home/showpublishedimage/2584/638911915974770000)
Mudd's current term will expire in May 2026.
